attributes.action: ensist local councils and energy providers/agencies give grants to council tenants wishing to instal mathods of producing their own power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I've found that only people that own their homes can do things such as have a small wind turbine or solar pannels. As a council tenant, being on a low income and being conserned about the environment I find it a struggle in the current climate to afford to make ends meat especailly with the high prices in energy and fuel. I believe it would be beneficial to both the gouvernment and environment to help us on a lower income to produce some of their own energy.
